articles.author: Sharon Braithwaite, Al Goodman, Barbie Latza Nadeau
articles.title: Italy issues ‘extreme’ health warning for 15 cities as heatwave grips Europe - CNN
articles.description: Italian authorities have issued an “extreme” health risk for 15 cities including Rome and Florence this weekend as a heatwave that is baking Europe threatens to bring record temperatures.
articles.content:
Italian authorities have issued an extreme health risk for 15 cities including Rome and Florence this weekend as a heatwave that is baking Europe threatens to bring record temperatures.
